title: SNORT hits
extract: A common way of taking a drug is to snort it, either directly up the nose from a smooth surface or through a straw or rolled up banknote. ... Mephedrone can give an almost instant hit, especially if you're new to the drug. Snorting gives a quicker, stronger hit than swallowing.Aug 30, 2018
extract_html: A common way of taking a drug is to snort it, either directly up the nose from a smooth surface or through a straw or rolled up banknote. ... Mephedrone can give an almost instant hit, especially if you're new to the drug. Snorting gives a quicker, stronger hit than swallowing.Aug 30, 2018
